Text:
Plot:Best friends, Hunter and Santo, live the excess of new York City: late night parties, women, and drugs. After a rough night Santo starts having visions from the 1800s, and the two embark on a spiritual journey to escape from the responsibilities of reality.

Genre: Action
Starring: Paz de la Huerta, Isaach De Bankole, Kirk Acevedo, Jane Bradbury, Mike Doyle

Not this one then?

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1913028/

Is it in English?

@ UrbanWolf, Nope... it's this one.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0418451/

It's (originally) called 5up 2down and it was (again... originally) released in 2006.

This 2011 release is (what it's) "Also Known As:
"Getting High" - (for the) USA (video title)".
